isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - VALVE COVER(S) AND/OR GASKET (V ENGINES); R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: VALVE COVER(S) AND/OR GASKET (V ENGINES); R & R AND/OR REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks, open hood & disconnect battery
Remove inside engine housing cover
Disconnect air intake to turbocharger tube
Remove left engine splash shield
Remove accelerator pedal position sensor
Remove access cover plate from floor
Disconnect oil dipstick tube from valve cover stud
Remove oil filler tube
Remove turbocharger air intake elbow & tube from valve cover breather
Remove Exhaust Back Pressure Sensor (EBPS) with tube and mount bracket attached
Reposition glow plug & fuel injector wiring harnesses from left side valve cover
Remove left valve cover mount bolts
Remove valve cover breather assembly
Remove left valve cover from vehicle
Remove air cleaner mounting bracket with air cleaner attached
Disconnect serpentine belt
Remove alternator
Remove belt tensioner & water pump idler
Remove alternator mounting bracket
Remove right side engine splash shield
Disconnect Electronic Control Module (ECM) & fuel injector wiring
Reposition glow plug solenoid & wiring for valve cover removal
Remove Electronic Control Module (ECM) with mount bracket attached
Remove right side valve cover
Install right side valve cover
Install Electronic Control Module (ECM) with mount bracket attached
Connect glow plug solenoid & wiring
Connect Electronic Control Module (ECM) & fuel injector wiring
Install alternator mounting bracket
Install water pump idler & belt tensioner
Install alternator
Connect serpentine belt
Install air cleaner mounting bracket with air cleaner attached
Install left side valve cover and gasket into position on engine
Install valve cover breather assembly
Install valve cover mount bolts
Position left side glow plug wiring harness to valve cover
Install Exhaust Back Pressure Sensor (EBPS) with tube and mount bracket attached
Install oil filler tube
Install oil dipstick tube to valve cover stud
Install turbocharger air intake elbow & tube to valve cover breather
Connect battery
Start engine assembly and check for leaks

note.para: You may need to connect the accelerator position sensor to start the engine

step1.para: Install access cover plate to floor
Install accelerator pedal position sensor
Install left & right engine splash shield
Install Engine Housing Cover
Close hood & remove wheel chocks
